section.title: Definitions
section.para: Definitions declare new types that can be used throughout a program.

section.title: Structure Definitions
section.para: The define keyword creates a new structure type with named properties.

entry.programlisting: define Point(x: int, y: int) Point(3, 4)
define Point(x: int, y: int) Point(3, 4).x
define Point(x: int, y: int) define Rectangle(origin: Point, width: int, height: int) Rectangle(Point(0, 0), 10, 5).width
